# 1888 Chicago White Stockings season

| league_place = 2nd
| owner = Albert Spalding
| manager = Cap Anson
| television =
| radio =
|}}
The 1888 Chicago White Stockings season was the 17th season of the Chicago White Stockings franchise, the 13th in the National League and the fourth at the first West Side Park. The White Stockings finished second in the National League with a record of 77â€“58, 9 games behind the New York Giants.
